editor.switch_as_x_confirm: Ovaj prekidač će biti sakriven i novi {domain} će biti dodat. Vaša postojeća konfiguracija koja koristi prekidač će nastaviti da radi.
editor.switch_as_x_remove_confirm: This {domain} will be removed and the original switch will be visible again. Your existing configurations using the {domain} will no longer work!
editor.switch_as_x_change_confirm: This {domain_1} will be removed and will be replaced by a new {domain_2}. Your existing configurations using the {domain_1} will no longer work!
editor.enabled_description: Onemogućeni entiteti neće biti dodati u Home Assistant.
editor.enabled_delay_confirm: Omogućeni entiteti će biti dodati u Home Assistant za {delay} sekundi
editor.enabled_restart_confirm: Ponovo pokrenite Home Assistant da biste završili sa omogućavanjem entiteta
editor.hidden_description: Skriveni entiteti neće biti prikazani na kontrolnoj tabli. Njihova istorija se još uvek prati i još uvek možete da komunicirate sa njima pomoću servisa.
editor.confirm_delete: Da li ste sigurni da želite ovo da obrišete?
editor.note: Napomena: Ovo možda još uvek neće funkcionisati sa svim integracijama.

stream.preload_stream_description: This keeps the camera stream open in the background so it shows quicker. Warning! This is device intensive.

stop.confirm_description: This will interrupt all running automations and scripts.

template.time: Ovaj šablon se ažurira na početku svakog minuta.

template.no_listeners: Овај шаблон не слуша никакве догађаје и неће се аутоматски ажурирати.

loading.loading_flow: Please wait while the options for {integration} are being initialized
Please wait while the repair for {integration} is being initialized

config_entry_system_options.title: Sistemske opcije za {integration}
config_entry_system_options.enable_new_entities_description: Ako treba da se novi uređaji za {integration} automatski dodaju.
config_entry_system_options.enable_polling_description: Ako Home Assistant treba da automatski proverava {integration} entitete za ažuriranja.
config_entry_system_options.restart_home_assistant: Potrebno je da ponovo pokrenete Home Assistant da bi promene stupile na snagu.

zha_reconfigure_device.heading: Ponovno konfigurisanje uređaja
zha_reconfigure_device.introduction: Reconfigure a device on your Zigbee network. Use this feature if your device is not functioning correctly.
zha_reconfigure_device.battery_device_warning: You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the reconfiguration process. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
zha_reconfigure_device.run_in_background: Možete da zatvorite ovaj dijalog i rekonfiguracija će se nastaviti u pozadini.
zha_reconfigure_device.in_progress: Uređaj se ponovo konfiguriše. Ovo može potrajati neko vreme.
zha_reconfigure_device.configuration_failed: Ponovno konfigurisanje uređaja nije uspelo. Dodatne informacije mogu biti dostupne u logovima.

services.reconfigure: Reconfigure ZHA device (heal device). Use this if you are having issues with the device. If the device in question is a battery powered device please ensure it is awake and accepting commands when you use this service.
services.updateDeviceName: Set a custom name for this device in the device registry.

confirmations.remove: Da li ste sigurni da želite da obrišete uređaj?

reasons.docker: The Docker environment is not working properly
